data.text: Patients w suicide risk history r 300x more likely 2 commit suicide w/in 1 week of discharge HHS IG report found many kids who hv experienced suicidal behaviors r not getting needed follow ups I sent a lttr 2 Dr Oz at CMS asking whats being done 2 enact IG rec & save young lives

If u r wondering what Democrats that run as “moderates” will do once in office look no further than dismantling of 287(g) in Virginia on DAY1 

287(g) which I authored allows local law enforcement 2partner w fed law enforcement for additional resources to keep communities SAFE
Met w CADCA abt my Drug Free Communities program, Office of Natl Drug Control Policy’s wrk and preventing youth drug use https://t.co/Y9PNpHX0MA
Met w Toni Lampley, Director of Iowa MENTOR. IA has 71 mentoring programs for youth in 76 counties https://t.co/Fpw2R2arL7

Sen Judic Subcmte held hrg 2day to examine the MASSIVE fraud discovered in Minnesota BILLIONS of taxpayer $$$ may hv been funneled 2fraudsters incl money meant 2help children w autism+the elderly+small biz Those involved MUST b held accountable & whistleblowers MUST b protected

Thx Sen Lee 4 chairing Judic subcmte hrg on proposed Netflix/Warner Bros merger The rising cost of streaming services affects families in Iowa & across America Regulators must carefully examine how this transaction could affect competition/consumers
Thx chair Ferguson for ur leadership on this issue

Glad 2c FTC hold Rx middlemen called PBMs accountable w Express Scripts settlement Ive called 4 PBM reform since 2018 Settlement is 1 piece of the PBM reform puzzle Congress finally took action in recent spending bill but more work needs 2b done 2 lower Rx prices

2day marks 20th anniv since Pres Bush signed my bipartisan Family Opportunity Act into law Thx 2 grassroots advocates glad 2 deliver lifeline 4 vulnerable families incl specialized care& wraparound services 4 kids w special needs

Glad 2 hear DOJ Antitrust Division announced its 1st whistleblower reward 2 a brave individual 4exposing $16M scheme tht drove up the price of used cars Patriotic whistleblowers r essential 2rooting out waste+fraud+abuse Thx 2 Trump admin 4 empowering & rewarding their work
